summary: - Basic knowledge of SQL;
- Postman: sending GET, POST requests. Checking the response
code, passing a variable to the environment, checking the JSON
structure, passing a variable from one request to another, export
collections and environments.
- Charles Proxy: sniffing traffic and replace data.
- Android Studio: can build apk and run an emulator.

- The skills of creating test documentation (check list, test cases,

- Understanding client-server architecture; - Knowledge of test
design techniques (equivalence classes, boundary value analysis,
pairwise testing, decision table). - Knowledge of testing framework
(concepts, goals, objectives)
- Skills to work with the requirements.
- Basic knowledge of protocols work principles (REST, SOAP, TCP/
IP, HTTP/HTTPs).
experience: QA Engineer март 2016 - сентябрь 2016  (7 месяцев) Днепропетровская область, Украина
